Text: Spasibo za zagruzku moego lyubimogo filma. Ya jivu zarubejom i ochen' obradovalas' kogda uvidela, shto etot film est'  v piratebay. Udachi~

I wasn't able to download it, not enough seeders.

Also, you made a type in the description.  Her name is Tosya not Tonya :).

This is probably my all-time favourite movie.
Sorry I just realized that you copied the description from the IMDb site and it's their typo not yours.
